text.section:
A unit of the Executive Branch of the State government may not create a permanent staff position that is in addition to the positions for which the State budget and its supporting documents specifically provide unless:
the Board of Public Works gives its approval; and
money for the position is available:
from the General Emergency Fund; or
by budget amendment, from other special or federal funds.

The approval of a new position under this section is temporary. However, unless the General Assembly deletes the position from the budget bill, the position continues with the compensation provided in the State budget.
